title: Tag manager
description: Create tags based on key:value pairs to categorise your OVHcloud resources and apply policies
tagType_predefined_tooltip: Created by OVHcloud, assigned to resources by you
tagType_system_tooltip: Created and assigned automatically by OVHcloud to your resources
defaultError: An error occurred while loading the page: {{error}}
resourcesBeingAssignedDescription: Select the resource(s) you want to tag from the list below
resourcesTaggedSuccess: The resources have been correctly assigned
resourcesTaggedError: An error occurred while assigning resources.
resourcesTaggedSomeError: Some resources were not assigned correctly:
noResourceAvailableForTagging: There are no available resources to assign
unassignTagModalDescription: Are you sure you want to remove the "{{tag}}" tag from the resources?
resourcesUnassignTagSuccess: The resources have been successfully unassigned
resourcesUnassignTagError: An error occurred while unassigning resources.
resourcesUnassignTagSomeError: Some resources were not unassigned correctly:
